contents.content: UNIT 02 面试话题 Interview Topics
Lesson 18 面试结果 Interview Results
面试过后，玛丽打电话向公司询问面试的结果。

contents.title: 玛丽：早上好，我是玛丽。
contents.answer: Mary: Good morning, this is Mary.

contents.title: 简：早上好，我是简，这里是苹果公司。
contents.answer: Jane: Good morning, this is Jane. This is Apple Co. Ltd.

contents.title: 玛丽：你好，简，是人力资源部吗？
contents.answer: Mary: Hello, Jane! Is that the Human Resource Department?

contents.title: 简：是的，这是。我能帮你吗？
contents.answer: Jane: Yes, this is. May I help you?

contents.content: 通常面试结束之后，应聘单位都会让面试者回去等候消息。若是及早有结果固然更好，但是大多数情况下都需要等待几天的时间。这时，就需要及时向面试方询问面试结果，并要选择好时机和方式。

contents.title: 玛丽：两周前我在贵公司面试，我打电话来想询问一下面试结果，我希望你能给我一个肯定的答复。
contents.answer: Mary: I had an interview with your company two weeks ago. I am calling to ask about the interview result. I hope you can give me a positive reply.

contents.title: 简：哦，结果出来了，我可以告诉你……是的，我找到你的名字了。你被录用了。祝贺你！
contents.answer: Jane: Oh, the results have come out, and I can tell you.…Yes, I find your name. You are hired. Congratulations!

contents.title: 玛丽：谢谢！听到这个消息，我感到很高兴。我什么时候方便上班呢？
contents.answer: Mary: Thank you! I am glad to hear that. When would it be convenient for me to start working?

contents.title: 简：下周一早上。
contents.answer: Jane: Next Monday morning.

contents.content: 一般大的公司会耗时长一点，我们一般要等上一段时间。如果没有结果的话，再向面试方询问结果，既显示了你的诚意，也不会让人觉得太过心急。而就询问的方式来说，可以打电话询问，也可以发邮件，只要态度礼貌，大方得体即可。

contents.title: 玛丽：我的起薪是多少呢？
contents.answer: Mary: What is the starting salary for me?

contents.title: 简：你的起薪是每月2500元，转正之后，工资会高点。
contents.answer: Jane: Your starting salary is 2500 yuan a month, and after you become a permanent employee, it will be higher.

contents.title: 玛丽：很感谢你们给予的这份工作。下周一我会准时报到，再见！
contents.answer: Mary: I appreciate the offer. I will come on time next Monday. See you then!

contents.title: 简：再见！
contents.answer: Jane: See you!

contents.content: 如果是打电话询问面试结果，也要在电话中透露出你对这份工作的期望，有时若是公司恰好有意，也就增加了你获得这份工作的机率。若是发邮件询问，那么邮件中要包含你的姓名、应聘的职位以及面试时间。一定要简单明了，并且委婉礼貌。

contents.title: 玛丽，面试结果不错吧？
contents.answer: Mary, did you have a good interview result?

contents.title: 你的面试结果怎么样？
contents.answer: How was your interview result?

contents.title: 尽管我很关心面试结果，但是我却毫无办法。
contents.answer: Although I care a lot about the interview result, I can do nothing about it.

contents.title: 电话通知我去签合同。
contents.answer: I was called to go and sign the contract.

contents.title: 很抱歉，我上周接受了另一份工作，我认为它很适合我。
contents.answer: I'm sorry. I accepted another offer last week and I think it suits me very well.

contents.title: 我迫不及待地想知道面试结果。
contents.answer: I am so eager to know the result of my interview.

contents.title: 你被录用了。
contents.answer: You are hired.

contents.title: 没关系，我再到其他公司试试。
contents.answer: It's okay. I can try other companies.

contents.title: 希望你能给我一个肯定的答复。
contents.answer: I hope you can give me a positive reply.

contents.title: 我们还在考虑，将在月底作出最后决定。
contents.answer: We are still considering everything , and we will make our final decision at the end of the month.
